channel.title: UITableViewCell on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in UITableViewCell on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Custom UITableViewCell for Text Input in Swift
item.description: The need to collect data via text input is a common in many applications. This walk-through showcases how to create a custom UITableViewCell for accepting text input within a UITableView. Outline Table Views for Data Entry? Step by Step Walkthrough Set up Storyboard with table view Set up table view prototype cell with text field Create new TextInputTableViewCell class Change cell class in Storyboard to TextInputTableViewCell Set reuse identifier Implement table view data source and delegate methods Run in simulator
